data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1 Developer Beta 2
data.expected_result: Bottom bar shouldn't overlap bottom role
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XS/XS Max] Bottom bar overlaps bottom role when filtering by role in member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Server Settings -> Members on a server where there are many roles - Tap the 3 dots on the top right hand corner - Tap filter - Scroll down to the bottom of the list
